params.amount: Amount of super token used to top-up the tap balance.
params.name: Name of the tap. Useful if creating multiple taps with the same supertoken, creator and NFT address.
params.nft: The NFT address for which a tap is being created.
params.ratePerNFT: Stream rate for the super token distribution.
params.superToken: The super token to be distributed by the tap.

getTapId(string,address,address).details: Uses keccak256 and abi.encode on the arguments.

params.creator: Tap creator's address.
params.name: Name of the tap. Has to be unique per creator and NFT.

createTap(string,address,uint96,uint256,.notice: This function creates a tap for a creator to distribute a particular supertoken.

getTapId(string,address,address).notice: Gives the tap id for a particular name, NFT address and a creator address.
